verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H241>ears<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you may <S%H3925>learn<s%> them, and <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> not <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> but with us, even us, <S%H428>who<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> of us <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

(I <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and you at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for you were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> not up into the <S%H2022>mount;<s%>) <S%H559>saying,<s%>
I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> none <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing that is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> or that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath,<s%> or that is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

You shall not <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> yourself to them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me,
And <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H505>thousands<s%> of them that <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> that <S%H5375>takes<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.
<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H5647>labor,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4399>work:<s%>

But the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> in it you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> you, nor your <S%H1121>son,<s%> nor your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> nor your <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> nor your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> nor your <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor your <S%H2543>ass,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> nor your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> that your <S%H5650>manservant<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservant<s%> may <S%H5117>rest<s%> as well as you.

And <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you <S%H1961>were<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out <S%H8033>there<s%> through a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by a <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3513>Honor<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged,<s%> and that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.
You shall not <S%H7523>kill.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H2530>desire<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H183>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> his <S%H7704>field,<s%> or his <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> or his <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that is your <S%H7453>neighbor's.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>assembly<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and of the thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice:<s%> and he <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%> And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them to me.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> (for the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> did <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%>) that you <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to me, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and your <S%H2205>elders;<s%>

And you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>showed<s%> us his <S%H3519>glory<s%> and his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> and we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H1696>talk<s%> with <S%H120>man,<s%> and he <S%H2425>lives.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H4100>why<s%> should we <S%H4191>die?<s%> for <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> us: <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H3254>more,<s%> then we shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

For <S%H4310>who<s%> is there of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> that has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as we have, and <S%H2421>lived?<s%>

<S%H7126>Go<s%> you <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say:<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> you to us <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you; and we will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> when you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you: they have <S%H3190>well<s%> said <S%H3605>all<s%> that they have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

O that there were <S%H2088>such<s%> an <S%H3824>heart<s%> in them, that they would <S%H3372>fear<s%> me, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H3605>always,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> that it might be <S%H3190>well<s%> with them, and with their <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever!<s%>
<S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H7725>Get<s%> you into your <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

But as for you, <S%H5975>stand<s%> you <S%H6311>here<s%> by me, and I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them, that they may <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> them to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> therefore as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: you shall not <S%H5493>turn<s%> aside to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

You shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and that it may be <S%H2895>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3423>possess.<s%>
